Key:
Heh heh. These fake Spirits... However,
with their numbers, they are proving to
be an issue.

Agreement. Also, our attacks are veering
off course because of the spatial manipulation.

Heh heh heh... Are you scared? You can step
down, Yuzuru.

Objection. Kaguya, you are the one diving
and weaving away from danger, let alone
out of breath. You should take a rest.
Wha, I-I'm not out of breath at all!
Doubt. Staaaaare...

Hehehehe. This is merely an omen of destruction.
My Storm Lance, the arbiter of tornadoes, is
engaging in some foreplay as I pierce through her.
Laughter. Storm Lance (lol).
D-Don't laugh!
Hee hee. You seem awfully confident.

Although the both of you will be vanquished
soon.

Issue. At this rate, our odds for victory will
diminish, Kaguya.

I'm of the same mind. Originally, I thought
the ones we destroyed were it, but...
Alignment. I had the same idea.

If we are at this point, we have no choice but
to unleash the Yamai forbidden power.

Inquiry. Do you mean to suggest that, alone, we
stand no chance, so we should work together?

Heh. Heh... Foolish. Isn't that...
That's not what I...
That's not exactly what I meant.

Proposal. I believe this is the most opportune
time for us to cooperate. Let us wipe them out
with one strike.
Yes, you're right! Let's go, Yuzuru!
Agreement. Charge, Kaguya!
Yes. For Shido's sake. Raphael... El Re'em!

Agreement. And for everyone else's sakes,
too. Raphael... Ell Na'ash!
Here we go, Yuzuru.
Response. Right beside you, Kaguya.
Is this what Berserk's Angel is capable of?!

Hehehe... I can feel it. The Yamai Sisters
combining into one. As long as Yuzuru is
here, I am the strongest.

Objection. It is the opposite. I am the strongest
when Kaguya is here.

Heh heh. We Yamai Sisters are two in one.
Therefore, we cannot lose!

Agreement. There is nothing the Yamai
Sisters cannot penetrate!
I won't allow it!
Protect, cloak of gales!

Rgh... They're shielding themselves with
wind...!
Now, let's go Yuzuru! My other half!
Response. Combined into one, the Yamais...
Raphael... El Kanaph!
AAAAAAAH!
